column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Went there expecting a great Chicago deep dish pizza
column2: I got a over-cooked piece of dough with tomatoes and cheese. Also
column3: no one decided to tell me and my family that the pizza would take 50 minutes to come out. (There is a preorder option but we were not aware of the 50 minute wait) After all the hype for the pizza
column4: we weren't the biggest fans. To make it even better
column5: the sausage was grey and didn't taste like anything. We also ordered a thin crust pizza which had a soft crust. Couldn't even bend it. All in all
